alert.note: Alert for Outagamie; Portage; Waupaca; Waushara; Winnebago; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Wood, Portage, northwestern Winnebago, Waushara, Waupaca and southwestern Outagamie Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 556 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms about 12 miles southeast of Stevens Point, affecting portions of Portage County and moving southeast at 35 mph into Waupaca, Waushara, Winnebago, and Outagamie counties. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stevens Point, Wisconsin Rapids, Waupaca, Wautoma, New London, Redgranite, Whiting, Amherst, Plainfield and Fremont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Outagamie; Portage; Waupaca; Waushara; Winnebago; Wood
